tool.name: MAD-filtering
tool.description: Perform quality checking and filtering on raw count data from single cell RNA-Seq experiment using MAD value

param.name: n_Mad
param.label: Maximum number of median absolute deviation

param.name: direction
param.label: filtering direction : both, upper or lower

param.name: prop_mt
param.label: Maximum proportion of mitochondrially aligned reads

param.name: prop_sp
param.label: Maximum proportion of exogenously aligned reads

param.name: nb_filters
param.label: Parameter for number of failed filters triggering removal
